title: lockups keep occurring
content: see above and you tell me how you can help.
creator: animaltacker

title: Blank unclickable bar on top of tabs bar in full screen
content: There is a blank bar on top of the tabs bar in full screen. It sits there at all times. This wasn't here a few days ago. Could this be a bug on the latest update of Firefox? I'm using Macbook Air 2017.
creator: kyrareyesmacariola

title: Screen Flickering on YouTube in Mac OS Ventura
content:
I'm running an M2 Mac Mini with Mac OS Ventura 13.3 hooked up to a Dell P2721Q monitor via HDMI cable. I just updated to the latest firmware for the monitor - M3F102.

The issue is when I go to YouTube through FireFox (or now Chrome) I get flickering on my screen. I don't have the same issue with Safari.

It seems only an issue with the HDMI port and if I use the USB-C connection on my monitor it seems ok.

Also if I turn on "Night Shift" that seems to fix it too.

So, many variables here at play.

Any information is appreciated.
creator: colinkerr

title: firefox wants to use the system keychain"import private key" in your keychain Mac M1
content:
Hello team,

I tried to open one web page where I need a certificate, and Firefox asked for the primary key, so I enter it. However, firefox gives me this message "Firefox wants to use the system keychain"import private key" in your keychain"

Troubleshooting has been done 1. Clear all cookies 2. get the option in help for troubleshooting Mode 3. More troubleshooting information and delete cache 4. Reset the laptop 5. Check the keychain if I have Firefox there, however, I did not find it

Could please help me with that? The issue is not resolved with all the above step

Regards,
creator: yasmi.gonzalez
